TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SortedDictionary`2/KeyCollection<TKey, TValue> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<!TKey>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!TKey>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<!TKey>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class SortedDictionary(Of TKey, TValue).KeyCollection Implements ICollection, ICollection(Of TKey), IEnumerable(Of TKey), IReadOnlyCollection(Of TKey)

public: ref class SortedDictionary<TKey, TValue>::KeyCollection sealed : System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<TKey>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<TKey>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyCollection<TKey>, System::Collections::ICollection

summary.span: 代表 中索引鍵的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of keys in a .
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回這種類型，其中包含中的所有索引鍵的執行個體。The property returns an instance of this type, containing all the keys in that . 中的索引鍵的順序中項目的順序相同中的關聯值的順序相同傳回屬性。The order of the keys in the is the same as the order of elements in the , the same as the order of the associated values in the returned by the property. 不是靜態的複本; 相反地，中原始的索引鍵是指回。The is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the keys in the original . 因此，變更為才會反映在繼續。Therefore, changes to the continue to be reflected in the .

threadsafe.span: 公用靜態 (在 Visual Basic 中) 這種類型的成員都具備執行緒安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: A可以支援多個讀取器同時，只要未修改集合。

span.span: A can support multiple readers concurrently, as long as the collection is not modified.

threadsafe.span: 即便如此，列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

span.span: Even so, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.

threadsafe.span: 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。

span.span: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不是靜態的複本; 相反地，中原始的索引鍵是指回。The is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the keys in the original . 因此，變更為才會反映在繼續。Therefore, changes to the continue to be reflected in the . 這個建構函式是 o （1） 運算。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

span.span: Copies the elements to an existing one-dimensional array, starting at the specified array index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將元素複製到陣列中相同的順序，以列舉值逐一。The elements are copied to the array in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the . 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

summary.span: 傳回在 中逐一查看的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
A structure for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + +`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 此位置未定義屬性。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，您必須呼叫方法，以將列舉值前進到第一個項目，再讀取的值集合的。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 屬性會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫。The property returns the same object until is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 您不能再次將 設定為集合的第一個項目；您必須建立新的列舉值執行個體。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空間中集合的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + +`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 此位置未定義屬性。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，您必須呼叫方法，以將列舉值前進到第一個項目，再讀取的值集合的。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 屬性會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫。The property returns the same object until is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果 超過集合結尾，列舉值會位於集合的最後一個項目之後，同時 會傳回 false。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns false. 當列舉值位於這個位置時，對 的後續呼叫也會傳回 false。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return false. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 您不能再次將 設定為集合的第一個項目；您必須建立新的列舉值執行個體。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空間中集合的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間中集合的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 屬性傳回的物件，可用來同步處理存取具備。The property returns an object that can be used to synchronize access to the . 同步處理的所有執行緒存取集合之前都鎖定的物件時才有效。Synchronization is effective only if all threads lock the object before accessing the collection. 取得這個屬性的值是 o （1） 運算。Getting the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
